text.tspan: Child deaths from pneumonia by risk factor, World, 1990 to 2017
Shown is the number of deaths of children younger than five from pneumonia and other lower respiratory diseases
by risk factor that was estimated to be responsible for these deaths.
Indoor air pollution from solid fuels
Source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease Study (2017)
Note: Risk factors can interact and overlap for a given cause of death; therefore the sum of deaths attributed to risk factors will exceed the total
